sourcesContent: .main { margin: auto; width: 400px; height: 600px; background: #fee6c1; overflow: hidden; border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 2px 10px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); position: relative; } /* Sakrij checkbox */ #chk { display: none; } /* Sign up sekcija */ .signup { position: absolute; width: 100%; height: 100%; top: 0; left: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center; transition: transform 0.8s ease-in-out; background: #fbf5e5; border-radius: 10px; } .signup label { font-size: 1.8em; color: #2a231f; margin-bottom: 20px; font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.5s ease-in-out; } /* Login sekcija */ .login { position: absolute; width: 100%; height: 100%; top: 0; left: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center; transition: transform 0.8s ease-in-out; background: #fee6c1; border-radius: 10px; transform: translateY(100%); } .login label { font-size: 1.8em; color: #2a231f; margin-bottom: 20px; font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.5s ease-in-out; } /* Polja za unos */ input { width: 80%; height: 40px; margin: 10px 0; padding: 10px; border: none; outline: none; border-radius: 5px; background: #fff; color: #333; box-shadow: 1px 2px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); font-size: 16px; } /* Dugmad */ button { width: 80%; height: 40px; margin: 20px 0; background: #2a231f; color: #fff; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; transition: background 0.3s ease, transform 0.2s ease; } button:hover { background: #fbf5e5; color: #2a231f; transform: scale(1.05); } /* Prijelazi izmeÄ‘u sekcija */ #chk:checked ~ .signup { transform: translateY(-100%); } #chk:checked ~ .login { transform: translateY(0); }
